name: Neil Craig
description: This re-prompted me to test Debian (Bullseye + Node 18.11 vs Alpine) images on Cloud Run. I ran a quick experiment for a couple of hours. Debian is ~: 30% lower CPU, 30% lower startup latency, 30% lower billable time ($), ~10% more RAM Thanks so much, as always, @liran_tal!

name: Neil Craig
description: Thanks to @liran_tal, we're now running Node 18 Debian (slim) in prod & I measured the improvements vs Alpine w/ same workload: ‚úì -16.3% CPU, ‚ùå+8.6% RAM, ‚úì -3.7% exec time, ‚úì -14.5% start latency, ‚úì -17.6% billable time (& thus $ saved), 5 lines of config changed. Anyone know why?
